column5: Beautiful furnished Highland Home built in 2015! 4 bedrooms/ 3 baths/ 3 car garage. 2 story with high ceilings and windows in the family room overlooking big backyard w/ grill! Study w/french doors. Main floor has a huge master suite with a double sink, soaking tub, separate shower and large walk-in closet. Upstairs has large gameroom and fully equipped theater room. 3 minutes to Brazos Town Center and 10 minutes to Sugar Land Town Square.
column8: 3650 sq ft Luxury Home in Brazos Town Center
